channel.title: Can you change your sources port number?
channel.description: well my servers ip/port is runescapeprivate.no-ip.org port is 5555...its up right now but im trying a new source and i need to change the port to 5555 because it says starting (sourcename) 43594....i need it to be 5555...help?

item.title: Can you change your sources port number?
item.dc:creator: @nd_w0t nd w0t
item.description:
@nd_w0t wrote:

Yeah you can, open up server.java or “server” Search in there, 43594, you should see something like…

public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594; //43594=default

Change the 43594, to 5555, and your done :-)…

Read full topic
item.source: Can you change your sources port number?
